movie.title: Jacob's Ladder
movie.description_intro: After his brother returns home from war, Jacob Singer struggles to maintain his sanity. Plagued by hallucinations and flashbacks, Singer rapidly falls apart as the world and people around him morph and twist into disturbing images. A remake of the 1990 thriller starring Tim Robbins.
movie.description_full: After his brother returns home from war, Jacob Singer struggles to maintain his sanity. Plagued by hallucinations and flashbacks, Singer rapidly falls apart as the world and people around him morph and twist into disturbing images. A remake of the 1990 thriller starring Tim Robbins.

movies.title: Listening
movies.summary: A team of genius-but-broke grad students invent mind-reading technology that destroys their lives and threatens the future of free will itself.
movies.description_full: A team of genius-but-broke grad students invent mind-reading technology that destroys their lives and threatens the future of free will itself.
movies.synopsis: A team of genius-but-broke grad students invent mind-reading technology that destroys their lives and threatens the future of free will itself.

movies.title: The Secret
movies.summary: A real murder case which was complicated by the minage ' trois relationship of the victim and the main suspects. As different witnesses narrated their conflicting stories, the case seemed set to lead to nowhere; especially when the real identity of the dead person was finally discovered.
movies.description_full: A real murder case which was complicated by the minage ' trois relationship of the victim and the main suspects. As different witnesses narrated their conflicting stories, the case seemed set to lead to nowhere; especially when the real identity of the dead person was finally discovered.

movies.title: Small Apartments
movies.summary: When a clumsy deadbeat accidentally kills his landlord, he must do everything in his power to hide the body, only to find the distractions of lust, the death of his beloved brother and a crew of misfit characters, force him on a journey where a fortune awaits him.
movies.description_full: When a clumsy deadbeat accidentally kills his landlord, he must do everything in his power to hide the body, only to find the distractions of lust, the death of his beloved brother and a crew of misfit characters, force him on a journey where a fortune awaits him.

movies.title: Double Life
movies.summary: As an adaptation of a Koike Mariko novel, which was inspired by the artwork True Stories by artist Sophie Calle, the film follows philosophy graduate Tamaki who, in turn, follows a man in her neighbourhood in the name of 'philosophical surveillance.' The man, it turns out, is having an affair.
